chatGptLabel: Initial Research on Companies while Job Searching
promptPrefix:
In [TARGETLANGUAGE], can you tell me about [Company Name] and what they do? I'm interested in applying for the [Job Role] position, what would my responsibilities be? And finally, what are some exciting things about working for [Company Name] that would make it a great place to work?

[PROMPT]
title: Initial Research on Companies while Job Searching
